subject: Tennis
Gerry Weber Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Rafael Nadal, the world’s top-ranked man, was knocked out of the Gerry Weber Open in Halle, Germany, on Thursday, losing by 6-4, 6-1 in the second round to the German wild card Dustin Brown, who is ranked 85th.
snippet: Rafael Nadal, the world’s top-ranked man, was knocked out of the Gerry Weber Open in Halle, Germany, on Thursday, losing by 6-4, 6-1 in the second round to the German wild card Dustin Brown, who is ranked 85th.
